name: Teleportish
description:
Have you ever played Space is key? Well this game is inspired by that. 

If you don't know what it is, to put it simply, it's a game where the only thing you can do is press the spacebar key. However, you have to time your jumps in order to get past the obstacles.

It's pretty simple and basic, so why not give it a go? How hard can pressing a spacebar be?

This game relates to the game's theme of inconvenient super powers since you can teleport, just a bit too high.
